name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flylighter: Capture Articles and Highlights to Notion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture bookmarks, article, and highlights with Flylighter – your new favorite web clipper for Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flylighter is your new favorite web clipper for Notion.

Easily save anything you discover on the web at super-fast speeds – webpages, highlights, full articles, and more.

With Flylighter, you can:

✅ Create Flows that capture web clips to Notion databases or pages
✅ Set property values in Notion databases – tags, dates, Relations, etc.
✅ Capture highlights that retain formatting - lists, headings, tables, and more
✅ Easily append new highlights to a previous capture
✅ Save resources at the speed of thought with Instant Capture mode and keyboard shortcuts

Soon, you’ll also be able to save your clips, highlights, and articles to many more platforms – including Obsidian, Zapier, Pipedream, and more. You’ll also be able to save resources and ideas on the go with our upcoming mobile app.

Our goal is to give you a set of powerful tools for quickly capturing anything and saving it to the second brain you’re already using, whatever it may be.

Flylighter is built and maintained by a small team of passionate Notion nerds, including Thomas Frank (the world’s most-followed Notion expert) and Eli Wimmer (creator of Notion Style Tweaks). After you install, say hi in our Discord!
